item.title: Apple is spending more on AI, but remains far behind its Silicon Valley peers - CNBC
item.description:
1. Apple is spending more on AI, but remains far behind its Silicon Valley peers  CNBC
  2. Our first taste of ‘Apple Intelligence’ is here. Here’s what works.  The Washington Post
  3. iOS 18.1 Beta: iPhone Apple Intelligence Arrives, But There’s A Catch  Forbes
  4. Apple iOS 18, iPadOS 18 public beta 2 out now: Here’s what’s new  Business Today
  5. A first look at Apple Intelligence and its (slightly) smarter Siri  The Verge
